#summary gwam-ros-pkg Software Overview

= gwam-ros-pkg Software Overview =

----
*The gwam-ros-pkg is a ROS repository for control of the Guardian-WAM robot in both simulation and the real world.*
----

For Installation of gwam-ros-pkg please refer to the [http://code.google.com/p/gwam-ros-pkg/wiki/GWAMROSInstallation gwam-ros-pkg Installation Instructions]

== Capability Overview == 

=== Basic Configuration === 
|| *Component*      || *ROS package/stack* ||
||WAM-Specific Messages || [http://code.google.com/p/gwam-ros-pkg/wiki/GWAMPackagewam_msgs wam_msgs] ||
||WAM-Specific Services || [http://code.google.com/p/gwam-ros-pkg/wiki/GWAMPackagewam_srvs wam_srvs] ||
||WAM Libbarrett Wrapper || [http://code.google.com/p/gwam-ros-pkg/wiki/GWAMPackagelibbarrett_ros libbarrett_ros] ||

|| Guardian Model (URDF) || [guardian_description] ||
|| GWAM Model (URDF) || [gwam_description] ||
